hero.subtitle: Join Myanmar's largest youth community. Learn new skills, attend events, find opportunities, and build meaningful connections.
hero.ctaPlaceholder: Enter your email to get started

howItWorks.title: It's Simple.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Find and join communities that match your interests and goals.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Engage with peers, mentors, and experts across Myanmar.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Participate in workshops, meetups, and networking events.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Build your skills, find opportunities, and make an impact.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.communitiesDesc: Join topic-based communities to connect with like-minded Myanmar youth.
features.eventsDesc: Attend workshops, networking nights, hackathons, and career fairs.
features.resourcesDesc: Access free courses, articles, videos, and tools curated for you.
features.jobsDesc: Discover jobs, internships, and freelance opportunities in Myanmar.

cta.title: Ready to Connect?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Myanmar youth building their future together.

communities.title: Communities
communities.subtitle: Find your tribe. Join communities that match your passion.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Don't miss out. Join events that help you learn and grow.

resources.title: Resources
resources.subtitle: Free learning materials curated for Myanmar youth.

jobs.title: Job Board
jobs.subtitle: Find your next opportunity. Updated weekly.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are building Myanmar's largest youth community platform.
about.missionText: To empower Myanmar's youth by providing a platform for connection, learning, and growth. We believe in the power of community to transform lives and build a brighter future for Myanmar.
about.visionText: A connected, skilled, and empowered generation of Myanmar youth leading positive change in their communities and beyond.
about.value1Desc: Everything we do is centered around building meaningful connections.
about.value2Desc: We welcome youth from all backgrounds across Myanmar.
about.value3Desc: We are committed to continuous learning and development.
about.value4Desc: We measure success by the positive change we create together.

auth.loginSubtitle: Login to your account to continue your journey.
auth.signupSubtitle: Join the largest Myanmar youth community today.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
